text: Jerry Yester (born on January 9, 1943) is an American former musician. == Overview == He was a member of three well known groups; The New Christy Minstrels, The Modern Folk Quartet and The Lovin' Spoonful. His older brother is musician Jim Yester, who is a member of The Association. Jerry's ex-wife was Judy Henske. Henske died in 2022. === Arrest === Jerry was arrested in 2017 for 30 counts of possession of Child Pornography. He was fired from the Lovin' Spoonful because of this arrest. He was convicted in 2019. == References == Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American folk musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from Alabama Category:American sex offenders Category:The Lovin' Spoonful Category:The New Christy Minstrels members
title: Jerry Yester
